name: The Fur in Me
description:
The Fur in Me is a 2D platform match color game where you follow a young Fur in a quest to save his own world from the mad Fearflies. To do so, you’ll have to smash your enemies while matching your color with theirs .

Features :

  • Genre : 2D platform match color ;
  • Gameplay : Run, jump, smash and change colors ;
  • Story : Find out how the Fearflies have invaded your world by collecting the missing images spread throughout the world ;
  • Aesthetics : Colorful worlds ;
  • Audio : Joyful sounds and music ;
  • Modes :
    • Main Story ;
    • Challenges - New levels and harder versions of existing ones ;
